strapiPost.title: Ride Your Bike to Give a Bike During NWA Bike-a-Palooza
strapiPost.content:
Several bike clubs of Northwest Arkansas have joined forces to host NWA Bike-a-Palooza, a series of group rides to raise funds for Pedal It Forward, this Saturday, Aug 19.

Join the Ride: Pedal it Forward collects and fixes used bikes and distributes them to those in need to increase bike access for health, transportation, and recreation.

Bike for Bikes: Enjoy the day with other cyclists on a road ride, mountain bike ride, or Greenway ride. Each option costs $25, which goes entirely toward Pedal it Forward, where $25 equals a bike for a kid in need.

Online registration closes tonight at midnight. Register HERE.
